title: Create FO-03 onboarding state interface and fo-experience shell
description:
Create the main fo-experience.tsx component with FO-03-specific state management.

File to create: app/fo-03/components/fo-experience.tsx

State interface per spec (FO03OnboardingData):
- name: string
- familiarity: 'new' | 'some' | 'very' | null
- topics: string[] (selected topic chips)
- situation: { text: string; chips: string[] }
- feelings: { text: string; chips: string[] }
- whatHelps: { text: string; chips: string[] }

OnboardingState extends FO03OnboardingData with:
- currentStep: number (0-13)
- isGenerating, generationError
- currentBatch, currentBatchNumber, currentCardIndex
- approvedAffirmations, skippedAffirmations
- selectedBackground, notificationFrequency

Include: Initial state, updateState() helper, goToStep(), nextStep() handlers, placeholder render.

Reference app/fo-02/components/fo-experience.tsx for patterns.
acceptance_criteria: npm run build succeeds; app/fo-03/components/fo-experience.tsx exists with OnboardingState interface
closed_reason: Created fo-experience.tsx with FO03OnboardingData interface (name, familiarity, topics, situation, feelings, whatHelps) and OnboardingState extending it with step/batch/swipe state. Implemented updateState, goToStep, nextStep, prevStep handlers. Added placeholder renderStep with all 14 steps (0-13). Updated page.tsx to render FOExperience. Lint and build pass.
